column4: how do, or more to the point, what do i need to add/install in Warty to get movie trailers to work besides w32codecs and gstreamer for streamtuner...i installed w32codecs ,but still can't get and movie trailers to play?
w32codecs is for the xine engine, not gstreamer
if you want to use totem try installing totem-xine
and a few native linux codecs
